name: Trench Diver
description:
•Game Identity: a steampunk Lovecraftian submarine simulation game with an elements of roguelike.
•Genre: Simulation, Roguelike, Turn based strategy

 Play as a sole crew of the “Trench Diver”, a small submarine send to discover the secret of the trench. Switch between micromanaging the submarine to stay functional and alive, and “Sonar mode” where player maneuver the submarine around to investigate objects show on radar, it could be a harmless fish, a valuable supply or a dangerous sea creature that will tear the submarine apart.
